data: {"generalSituation":"Under the persistent influence of a dry winter monsoon, the weather will be generally fine with cold mornings over Guangdong today and tomorrow. With the monsoon moderating slightly over the weekend, temperatures will rise slightly over southern China, but it will still be cool in the morning. An easterly airstream is expected to affect the coast of southern China early next week, and it will be windy over the region. A dry northeast monsoon will bring generally fine weather to the coast of Guangdong midweek next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260108","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 3 to 4, occasionally force 5 offshore at first.","forecastWeather":"Fine and very dry.
